title: VMRay Platform
description:
VMRay provides advanced threat analysis and detection by integrating its unique agentless hypervisor-based sandbox with a real-time analysis. 

This connector enables the ingestion and correlation of VMRay analysis data including IOCs, VTIs, and MITRE ATT&CK techniques for faster detection and response.
short_description: VMRay provides advanced threat analysis and detection by integrating its unique agentless hypervisor-based sandbox with a real-time analysis.
